SummaryEnglish: Rin Namiki's mother was a champion in the sport of Jet Racing, a competitive form of jet skiing played on rivers using high-powered machines and two-woman teams. Now in high school, Rin is moving from the rural outskirts of Nagasaki to Tokyo to take up her mother's sport, but she's in way over her head, at least in terms of country versus city attitudes. This frustrates and annoys her roommate at the school dorms, another aspiring Jet Racer named Misa, and it only gets worse when Rin accepts a challenge from the top high school Jet Racer over rights to use the Kanda River. Can Rin prove that racing runs in her blood?

1.SummaryEnglish: As if called together by fate, Rin moved to the big city and almost immediately met Misa... but their partnership didn't exactly get off to a smooth start!

2.SummaryEnglish:
Jet Racing is back, and it’s wetter and wilder than ever! Catch up with Rin, Misa and all your favorite Jet Racers as they return to the waves in this exciting follow-up to Kandagawa Jet Girls. The racing never ends in the Kandagawa Jet Girls OVA!

This OVA was included on a blu-ray disc bundled with the PlayStation 4 game 'Kandagawa Jet Girls DX Jet Pack (Limited Edition)', released in Japan on January 16, 2020. An English subtitled version was made available through streaming platforms HIDIVE & VRV on January 24, 2020.

1.SummaryEnglish: The Kandagawa is calling — and Rin is determined to answer. Will a chance meeting with the cool and aloof Misa Aoi draw her down the path of destiny?

2.SummaryEnglish: The race is on, and Kaguya and Kuromaru are giving Rin and Misa a run for their money! Who will be the victor in this match to decide supremacy over the Kandagawa?

3.SummaryEnglish: After all their hard work recruiting for the Jet Racing Club, Misa and Rin deserve a break! But their R&R sours when they stumble upon two rather eccentric Jet Racers…

4.SummaryEnglish: It's just a routine Jet Race to see who'll walk away with that rare yellow dolphin keychain... right? Wait, Misa and Rin's opponents are WHO?! Uh oh…

5.SummaryEnglish: Rin and Misa are on the hunt for a new core unit for their training machine — and Misa is after Rin’s phone number, provided she can work up the courage to ask her for it.

6.SummaryEnglish: Twins Ziyu and Dina have been making waves as idols and Jet Racers! Can Rin and Misa hope to compete against their opponents' nimble machinery and synchronized technique?

7.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious cryptid lurks beneath the waters of the Kandagawa. Who will discover the true nature of the beast!? Well, it won’t be Rin, because she has a test to study for...

8.SummaryEnglish: Yuzu and Manatsu claim that the elusive beast lives in the shadowy diversion channels beneath the Kandagawa, but Nyu-Nyu is not the only creature lurking in those dark depths.

9.SummaryEnglish: The Kandagawa Cup prelims have arrived, and the Kandagawa Jet Girls are ready to race — but Rin and Misa’s first opponent seems to have a lot on her mind besides Jet Racing…

10.SummaryEnglish: Ruca-chan is in dire need of an upgraded power unit, but power units are incredibly expensive. Luckily Rin thinks she knows how they can earn the money to buy one.

11.SummaryEnglish: To achieve victory in the Kandagawa Cup, Rin will need to forge her own path — and just when she needs to hear it, advice from her mother springs from an unexpected source.

12.SummaryEnglish: Win or lose, Rin and Misa now race as one. Will their teamwork hold in the most important Jet Race of their lives and against the ultimate enemy, Kaguya Shijyuin?
